T

TapirCrawlConfiguration - Class in org.gbif.crawler.protocol.tapir
Holds information necessary to crawl a TAPIR resource:

target URL content namespace, a list of supported namespaces is available in the TapirCrawlConfiguration.VALID_SCHEMAS field

This object is immutable.
